blocks.name: ellz1
blocks.content: Membership in a lower set of integers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: lzunuz
blocks.content: The union of a lower set of integers and an upper set of integers which abut or overlap is all of the integers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: fz1eqin
blocks.content: Express a one-based finite range as the intersection of lower integers with ` NN ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Oct-2014.)

thm fz1eqin(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn0), wceq(co(nat1, cfz, c0), cin(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn)))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), cin(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn), wcel(c0, cn0))
  bitr4d(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(cdif(cz, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cn)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn0), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, c0)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cz), wbr(nat1, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))), wcel(nat1, cz), wcel(c0, cz))
